attributes.action: WIFI hubs at Southampton Solent University
attributes.additional_details:
Due to being restricted of having no Wifi access in our flat block as Southampton Solent students we currently face the scenario of not being able to use our own laptops and tablets in the kitchen, instead we have to sit in our rooms for hours on end linked up to a slow ethernet wired up connection and being able to have the the chance to link up to a Wifi router which we already have in place but the University firewall bans us from using it! Please take this into consideration into letting us have Wifi routers for our halls.

Thanks, Southampton Solent Students
